remarks: Part of proof of Lemma E in [Crawley] p. 115.  (Contributed by NM, 28-Nov-2012.)
statement:
cdleme21.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdleme21.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cdleme21.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
cdleme21.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdleme21.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdleme21.u $e |- U = ( ( P .\/ Q ) ./\ W ) $.
cdleme21c $p |- ( ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) /\ Q e. A ) /\ ( S e. A /\ P =/= Q /\ -. S .<_ ( P .\/ Q ) ) /\ ( z e. A /\ ( P .\/ z ) = ( S .\/ z ) ) ) -> -. U .<_ ( S .\/ z ) ) $.
